Intervalli bande:
 delta=[1,3]Hz
 theta=[4,7]Hz
 alpha=[8,12]Hz
 beta=[13,24]Hz
 low gamma=[30,45]Hz

Divisione dello scalpo:
 LFP=[18 19 21 22 23 25 26 32]
 RFP=[1 2 3 4 8 9 10 14]

 RF=[5 105 106 111 112 116 117 118 121 122 123 124]
